# <a name="create-an-email-signature-in-outlook-on-the-web"></a><span data-ttu-id="a077a-102">Opprette en e-postsignatur i Outlook på nettet</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a077a-102">Create an email signature in Outlook on the web</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="a077a-103">gå til</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a077a-103">Go to</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' />
 <span data-ttu-id="a077a-104">**Innstillinger**  >  **Vise alle Outlook-innstillinger**  >  **Skriv og svar**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a077a-104">**Settings** > **View all Outlook settings** > **Compose and reply**.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="a077a-105">Under **e-postsignatur**skriver du inn signaturen din og bruker de tilgjengelige formaterings alternativene til å endre utseendet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a077a-105">Under **Email signature**, type your signature and use the available formatting options to change its appearance.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a077a-106">*Obs!* Du kan ha bare én signatur per konto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a077a-106">*Note:* You can have only one signature per account.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a077a-107">Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, kan du se [opprette og legge til en e-postsignatur i Outlook på nettet](https://support.office.com/article/5ff9dcfd-d3f1-447b-b2e9-39f91b074ea3).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a077a-107">To learn more, see [Create and add an email signature in Outlook on the web](https://support.office.com/article/5ff9dcfd-d3f1-447b-b2e9-39f91b074ea3).</span></span>
